conversations.description: Client asks about the statute of limitations for personal injury in California; LexiLegal fetches the Civil Code section and explains the deadline.
User wants to know if a non‑compete clause is enforceable in Texas; the bot searches Texas case law, cites recent rulings, and flags for attorney review.
A landlord requests guidance on terminating a lease for non‑payment; LexiLegal retrieves relevant statute, summarizes key steps, and retrieves firm precedent memo.
Entrepreneur inquires about forming an LLC in Delaware; the assistant fetches the Delaware General Corporation Law provision and provides a concise formation checklist.
Client wonders whether a breach of warranty claim can be brought under the Uniform Commercial Code; LexiLegal pulls UCC Article 2 text and summarizes the claim elements.
User asks about privacy obligations under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA); the bot fetches statutory definition, summarizes requirements, and notes need for legal counsel.
